title: Boston Now One Step Closer To Allowing ILLEGAL Citizens To Vote In Local Elections
description:
Most countries don’t tend to allow noncitizens to vote. Which is a very sensible and fair rule to have. Why should we start allowing people to vote who don’t have a stake in this country to the extent a native-born citizen or someone who worked very hard to earn that right does? And that is just on the surface level of concern. How can we know that noncitizens or “residents” want what is best for this country? If we begin to allow foreigners to vote in our elections, we are de facto allowing them to at least contribute to where the future of this country goes. This subsequently makes the votes of actual citizens meaningless.

This is also why the very woke City of Boston has decided it will allow residents with “legal status” to vote.

—

title: Democrats Introduce Bill, Would DEMAND Chick-fil-A Open On Sundays
description:
Lawmakers in New York often try and find ways to punish businesses and people who don’t align 100 percent with their lack of a thought process. It is not news that many on the left have disliked Chick-fil-A for quite some time now. The founder of Chick-fil-A was a very religious man. That is why he decided to keep the restaurant closed on Sundays. And ever since then, the left’s hate for fried chicken sandwiches has only grown stronger.


— (@)

title: Watch: Grinch 'prank' goes horribly wrong when lil' man starts throwing hands to save his presents
description:
Yes, Die Hard is a Christmas Movie! Dare your friends to change your mind with our new Christmas long sleeve!

I guess terrorizing their children with the Grinch is something parents are doing these days. In the olden times, our fathers wouldn't show emotion or tell us that they loved us. In 2023, dads get one of their buddies to dress like the Grinch and steal their kids' presents, hoping their kid's emotional and traumatic response will trend on social media.

This little kid wasn't having it and was going to stop the Grinch by any means necessary.

title: Left-wing rag has discovered something new that's super racist and needs to be more "inclusive":  crossword puzzles
description:

So as of now, we must add yet another thing to the list of inanimate objects that are bigoted. And that thing is crossword puzzles. I know you probably assumed it would be sudoku given that math is also racist. But nope, we are adding crosswords to that list.
